name: PANIC-19
description:
Run and dash around each level collecting all the toilet paper - avoid roaming viruses. Collect the hand sanitiser for a brief spell of immunity and the hearts to regain health.

How To Play
Use LEFT and RIGHT ARROW KEYS to walk left and right. Walk up to a platform edge and press LEFT/RIGHT again to dash across if there is an adjacent platform. Use UP and DOWN ARROW KEYS to zip to platforms above and below you.

Notice
This is a game made for fun. Please do not hoard toilet paper in real life.
